text:
[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] Look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 ::Music:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this attacks, if all of your Characters are ::Music::, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose 1 of them, return it to the top of your Library, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
[C] You cannot play Events or BACKUP from hand.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have a ::Music:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1000, Level 1 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[S] [Rest this] Choose a card in your hand and put it in your Stock.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your ::Music:: Characters.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] Your other '"Reliable Chairperson" Touko Kirigaya' and '"Reliable Chairperson" Mashiro Kurata' gain +1000 Power.
[A] BOND '"Reliable Chairperson" Touko Kirigaya' or '"Reliable Chairperson" Mashiro Kurata' [Discard a card from your hand]

[C] ASSIST All your Level 0 or lower Characters in front of this gain +1000 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 Level 1 or higher card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. (Climax cards are considered to be Level 0 for this effect)

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Cost of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character on the bottom of the Library.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[A] When this attacks, if you have 4 or more cards in your hand, for the turn this gains +3000 Power.

[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Shine, Once Again" is in your Climax Zone and you have another ::Music:: Character, put the top 2 cards of your Library into the Waiting Room, and choose up to 1 Level X or lower ::Music:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand. X equals the sum of the Levels of the cards put into Waiting Room by this effect.
--None--

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library into the Waiting Room, for the turn this gains +X Power. X equals the number of ::Music:: Characters placed in the Waiting Room by this effect times 3000.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, draw up to 1 card, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[C] During Battles involving this, you may not play BACKUP or Events from hand."
[A] CHANGE [Put this in the Waiting Room] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose a '"Stars in the Blue Sky" Mashiro Kurata' in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, put the bottom 3 cards of your Opponent's Library into their Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the number of Climax cards among those cards. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] During your Opponent's turn, when Damage taken by you isn't Cancelled, if this is in the Front Row, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.
Choose a Level X or lower ::Music:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand. X equals the number of '"Negative Girl" Mashiro Kurata' in your Waiting Room.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[A] When this is placed from hand to your Climax Zone, choose up to 1 Character with a Soul Trigger Icon, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your Characters and for the turn they gain +1 Soul.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Music:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [Discard a ::Music:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "Our Music" is in your Climax Zone and you have another ::Music:: Character, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 2 ::Music:: Characters from among them, show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and put them on top of your Library in any order.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Draw Phase, reveal the top card of your Library. If it is Level 1 or higher, you may put this card in Stock. (Climax cards are considered Level 0. Put the revealed card back)

[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other ::Morfonica:: Characters, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax in your Opponent's Waiting Room, take all other cards from their Waiting Room, return them to your Opponent's Library, and your Opponent shuffles their Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may choose a Character in your hand whose Level is equal to or lower than your Level, place it to any Slot of your Stage, and for the turn, that Character gains +1 Soul.
[A] [(4)] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn, that Character gains the following ability. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this card's Damage is Cancelled, you may Deal the same amount of Damage to your Opponent." (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] If you have 1 or fewer other Characters, this gains +1500 Power.
[A] At the beginning of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may move this card to the empty Left Slot in your Front Row. (Leftmost slot only)

[C] All your other ::Music:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] CHANGE [Put this in the Waiting Room] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 '"Daylight" Touko Kirigaya' in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in. (This cannot be used if this isn't on the Stage at the start of the Climax Phase)
[A] [(1) Rest 2 Characters] Put top 2 card of your deck into your Waiting Room, choose one of ::Music:: character with level X or lower, and return back to your hand. X is the total level of those cards.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Music:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Music:: Characters.
[A] CHANGE [Put this in the Waiting Room] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 '"Morfonica" Touko Kirigaya' in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in. (This cannot be used if this isn't on the Stage at the start of the Climax Phase)

[C] Your other Character in the Front Row Center Slot gains +500 Power.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of your other Character becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] This gets -2 Level while on the Stage.
[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Music:: Characters, this gains +1500 Power and the card Opposite this gains "[C] This cannot Side Attack."
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other ::Music:: Characters, you may choose a ::Music:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it in your Stock.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] Your Opponent may not play Events from hand during battles involving this.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, search your Library for up to 1 ::Music:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] CX COMBO [Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "Beautiful Birthday" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, Deal 2 Damage to your Opponent, look at the top card of your Opponent's Library, and put it on the top or bottom of their Library. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step.
[A] When this card's Damage is cancelled, you may return this to hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Pushing for your Dream" is in your Climax Zone, choose 1 of your ::Music:: Characters and for the turn that Character gains the following ability. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may choose a ::Music:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand."

[C] ASSIST All your ::Music:: Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] [Rest this] When you use ACCELERATE, if this is Standing, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 ::Music:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it in your Stock.

[A] [(2)] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other ::Raise A Suilen:: Characters, you may pay cost. If so, place all of your Opponent's Stock in their Waiting Room, and place the same number of cards from the top of their Library to their Stock.

[A] During the turn this is placed from hand to the Stage, at the start of your Encore Step, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] ACCELERATE [Put a ::Music:: Character from your Waiting Room to your bottom of your Clock] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose a card from your Waiting Room, return all other cards in your Waiting Room to your Library, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, all of your Level 0 and lower Characters gain the following ability for the turn. "[A] When this attacks, look at the top card of your Library, and put it on top of your Library or in your Waiting Room."
[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to X cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards into the Waiting Room. X equals the number of your ::Music:: Characters.

[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Music:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] When this attacks, all of your Characters gain the following ability for the turn. "[A] When this reveals a Treasure Icon during Trigger Check, you may draw a card. If so, choose a card from your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room."

[A] When this is placed from the hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, that character gains the following ability. "[C] This cannot move to another Slot."
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Cost of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[A] When this attacks, reveal the top card of your Library. If that card is a Character with ::Poppin' Party:: or ::Raise A Suilen::, or an Event, choose 1 of your Characters with ::Poppin' Party:: or ::Raise A Suilen:: and for the turn that Character gains +3000 Power.

[C] During battles involving this, no player may play BACKUP from hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your ::Music:: Characters.

[C] All of your Opponent's Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [(2)]".
[A] When this reveals a Treasure Trigger Icon during Trigger Check, you may choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.

[C] For each of your Opponent's Back Row Characters, this gains +2500 Power.
[A] ENCORE [(1) Put a Character from the Stage to the Waiting Room]
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[S] [Discard 2 cards from hand to the Waiting Room, put this in the Waiting Room] Choose a ::Music:: Character in your Waiting Room whose Level is equal to or lower than your Level and place it to the Slot this was in.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Music:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If the revealed card is a ::Music:: Character, this gets +1 Level and +1500 Power for the turn. (Put the revealed card back where it was)
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your other ::Music:: Characters, Rest it and move it to an empty Slot in the Back Row.

[C] For each of your other ::Music:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(2) Send this to Memory] When this card's Damage is Cancelled, if "Daylight" is in your Climax Zone and you have 4 or more other ::Music:: Characters you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character from your Waiting Room and place it to the Slot this was in. (Battle does not occur)

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] For each of your other ::Music:: Characters in the Back Row, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] During the turn this is placed from hand to the Stage, at the start of your Encore Step, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Morfonica:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] [Put the top card of your Library to your Clock] At the beginning of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, you may move this to your empty Back Row Slot.

[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character on the bottom of the Library.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, choose up to 1 ::Raise A Suilen:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1 Level and +1000 Power.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row and move it to another empty Slot in the Front Row.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room. If there is at least 1 Level 0 or lower Character card among them, this may Side Attack without Soul Penalty for the turn.
[A] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] ASSIST All your ::Morfonica:: Characters in front of this gain +1500 Power.
[A] CHANGE [Put this in the Waiting Room] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 '"Daylight" Rui Yashio' in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in. (This cannot be used if this isn't on the Stage at the start of the Climax Phase)

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, you may return this to hand. If so, choose 1 choose up to 1 ::Music:: Character in your Waiting Room and place it to Stock.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 2 or more other ::Music:: Characters, you may draw a card. If so, discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.
[S] [(1) Place this in the Waiting Room] Choose up to 1 ::Music:: Character in your hand whose Level is equal to or lower than your Level and place it to the Slot this was in.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Music:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] During this card's Battle, if Damage you are dealt is cancelled, you may return this to your hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top or bottom of the Library.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character on the bottom of the Library.

[A] [Discard 2 ::TRAIT:: Characters from hand to the Waiting Room] When you use the BACKUP of this, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters whose Level is higher than the Level of the Opponent and put it on the bottom of their Library.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] If you have another Front Row '"Rausch und/and Craziness II" Chu2' this gains +5500 Power and "[A] ENCORE "Discard a ::Music:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room."
[C] Your other '"Rausch und/and Craziness II" Chu2' gain +2000 Power and the following 3 abilities. "[C] This cannot be chosen by your Opponent's abilities." "[C] This cannot be Reversed by your Opponent's Characters' [A] abilities." "[A] [(1)] When this Attacks you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step."

[A] When this attacks, if the Level of the Character Opposite this is 3 or higher, this gains +6000 Power for the turn.
[A] CHANGE [Put this in the Waiting Room] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 '"Summerly Tone" Rui Yashio' in your Waiting Room and put it in the Slot this was in. (This cannot be used if this isn't on the Stage at the start of the Climax Phase)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top or bottom of the Library.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, your Opponent chooses a number between 0, 1, 2, and 3. Reveal the top card of your Library, and if it's a Character card with the same Level as the number chosen by the Opponent, put it in any Slot on the Stage. (Otherwise put it back where it was)

[C] For each of your other ::Music:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When this attacks, if the Character Opposite this is Level 2, for the turn this gains +6000 Power.
[C] For each of your other "Chu2, Gatecrashing" in the Front Row, this gains +2000 Power.
[C] For each of your other "Pareo, Gatecrashing" in the Front Row, this gains +2000 Power.

[C] If the Level of the Character Opposite this is higher than the Level of this, this cannot Front Attack.
[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Music:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.

[A] When you use BACKUP of this, if all your Characters are ::Music::, you may put the top card of your Library in Stock.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2000, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[A] When this card attacks, choose 1 of your Characters and for the turn that Character gains +5000 Power.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your other Characters and place it to Stock.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
